parse: Verb - Present Participle Middle or Passive - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: To sit, be seated, enthroned; I dwell, reside. From kata; and hemai; to sit down; figuratively, to remain, reside.

parse: Verb - Imperfect Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: From teros; to guard, i.e. To note; by implication, to detain; by extension, to withhold; by extension, to withhold.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
(a) there, yonder, in that place, (b) thither, there. Of uncertain affinity; there; by extension, thither.
